H3.text: when did the subway open in new york. 1904

A4.text: The first underground line of the subway opened on October 27, 1904.

A5.text: The first underground line of the subway opened on October 27, 1904, almost 36 years after the opening of the first elevated line in New York City (which became the IRT Ninth Avenue Line).
